title: Piaggio to launch mid-segment Aprilia bike
description: "We are working on a global motorcycle project that will be focused on all the countries where we have our factories that include Italy, India, Vietnam, Indonesia and China," said Davide Zanolini, executive vice president, global marketing and communication, at Piaggio Group, and chief marketing officer of Piaggio Fast Forward, a group entity focused on technology and design.
